trade.notInTradeTime: It is not a trading time right now
trade.lossPriceLessThanError: Loss price must be less than {{price}}
trade.lossPriceGreatThanError: Loss price must be greater than {{price}}
trade.profitPriceGreatThanError: Profit price must be greater than {{price}}
trade.profitPriceLessThanError: Profit price must be less than {{price}}
trade.sellWhenRateIsDesc: Also known as a Limit order, this feature enables automatic execution of a trade once the instrument’s price reaches the set level. This allows traders to enter the market at a predefined favorable price.
trade.closeProfitDesc: Also known as Take Profit, this feature enables automatic close of a position once the asset’s price reaches the set level. This is done to lock in profits and exit the trade with a positive return.
trade.closeLossDesc: Also known as Stop Loss, this feature enables automatic close of a position once the asset’s price reaches the set level. This is a risk management tool used to protect capital from further loss.
trade.openPositionEmptyDesc: Open new positions in the Trade tab or in the instrument chat
trade.pendingPositionEmptyDesc: All pending orders, including limit, stop, and stop-limit orders, will be shown here.
trade.closedPositionEmptyTitle: You have no positions closed over {{ period }}
trade.closedPositionEmptyDesc: All closed positions will be available here.
trade.contractSizeDesc: Amount of asset in a single trading position.
trade.executionTypeDesc: Method of filling out trading positions.
trade.hedgedMarginDesc: Margin size required for opposing positions to manage risks.
trade.commissionDesc: Charge for opening and closing trading positions.
trade.longDesc: Fee for holding a long (Buy) position overnight.
trade.shortDesc: Fee for holding a short (Sell) position overnight.
trade.descriptionDesc: Fee for holding a short (Sell) position overnight.Fee for holding a short (Sell) position overnight.Fee for holding a short (Sell) position overnight.Fee for holding a short (Sell) position overnight.Fee for holding a short (Sell) position overnight.Fee for holding a short (Sell) position overnight.
trade.swapTypeDesc: Way of calculating the fee for holding a position overnight.

wallet.scanDesc: Scan the QR code to verification
wallet.addressPrompt: Copy the address of your USDT (TRC20) wallet or scan user QRcode to Deposit
wallet.addressPromptDesc: Use the copied address during the transfer from your personal USDT (TRC20) wallet to your USDT (TRC20) wallet. This is your permanent address. You can save this address to use it next time you make a deposit.
balanceDesc: Balance is the calculated total of all completed transactions on a trading account, including deposits and withdrawals. It can be the amount of funds you have before opening orders, or after you have closed all open orders; the balance does not change while orders are open.
wallet.bankAccount: Bank Card Number of the Remitter
wallet.confirmDepositDesc: Confirm the remittance picture is correct and click submit
wallet.depositConfirmPrompt: If you submit false recharge screenshots multiple times, your account will be suspended.
wallet.depositDetailsDesc: This is an approximate conversion rate. It may change by the time the transaction is processed
wallet.depositBankPrompt: To use this method for transferring funds, please ensure that your remittance information is filled out accurately. Be sure to transfer the exact amount you entered to the account provided by Forxl. Please use a bank card registered under your real name for the transfer. Any transfers not made by you personally will not be credited, and any fees incurred due to refunds will be borne by you.
wallet.depositCryptoPrompt: To use this method for transferring funds, please ensure that your remittance information is filled out accurately. Be sure to transfer the exact amount you entered to the cryptocurrency address provided by Forxl. Please use the wallet address you have provided for the transfer. If your actual payment address does not match the address you submitted, any fees incurred due to refunds will be borne by you.
wallet.depositWalletDesc: Please use the wallet to scan the code to pay or copy the wallet address
wallet.depositTrc20Prompt: Please do not deposit any non-TRC20 network USDT assets to the below addresses, otherwise the assets will not be recovered!
wallet.depositBepPrompt: Please do not deposit any non-BEP assets to the below addresses, otherwise the assets will not be recovered!
wallet.depositPaymentPrompt: You are required to deposit the exact amount of {{amount}} {{unit}} to prevent a delayed transaction.
wallet.depositTransferPrompt: To transfer your funds with this method, please, use the QR form on the FBS website only. The payments made directly from your Bank Account to your FBS account will not be enlisted.
equityDesc: Equity is the total value of the trading account, comprising of account balance and floating P&L.
marginDesc: Margin is the funds used to open and maintain positions. If it drops too low, an alert, Margin call, is issued. Further decrease triggers Stop out, when losing positions are closed to save capital.
freeMarginDesc: Free margin is the funds available to open new positions after accounting for floating P&L and margin tied up in open positions.

children.title: Balance
children.desc: Balance is the calculated total of all completed transactions on a trading account, including deposits and withdrawals. It can be the amount of funds you have before opening orders, or after you have closed all open orders; the balance does not change while orders are open.

children.title: Equity
children.desc: Equity is the total value of the trading account, comprising of account balance and floating P&L.

children.title: Floating P&L
children.desc: Floating P&L (Profit/Loss) shows your profit or loss on open positions. It includes floating funds plus swaps and commissions, if there are any.

children.title: Pending deposit/withdrawal
children.desc: The total amount of funds from pending deposit and withdrawal requests that are currently being processed for the trading account.

children.title: Margin
children.desc: Margin is the funds required as collateral to open and maintain a leveraged trading position.

children.title: Free margin
children.desc: Free margin is the funds available to open new positions after accounting for floating P&L and margin tied up in open positions.

children.title: Margin level
children.desc: Margin level is the ratio of Equity to Margin, showing available margin for new trades. If the Margin level drops too low, a Margin Call is issued. If it decreases further, a Stop Out happens, closing positions to avoid a negative balance.

wallet.initial: The authentication module is being initialing. Please wait a moment.
wallet.minimumDepositPrompt: The minimum deposit amount is {{min}}. If you deposit less than the minimum amount, your funds will be lost.
wallet.usdtPrompt: Deposit exactly in USDT. Do not use P2P marketplaces. Otherwise, your transaction will be considered a third-party payment and rejected.
wallet.openWalletDesc: Open your bank card digital wallet
wallet.openCryptoDesc: Open your crypto wallet or exchange app.

tools.calendarDesc: Use our economic calendar to keep track of market-moving events and announcements. We provide you with exact dates, times and currencies involved, as well as the degree of volatility that is estimated to be observed in the market preceding or following a specific incident. This is indicated by yellow, orange or red bars which mean low, average or high volatility, respectively.

bonusDesc.title: Cascades allocation rules
description: In our bonus distribution system, bonuses generated from client transactions are allocated according to a cascading tier system. First, direct promoters who meet the distribution criteria receive their entitled bonuses. Then, any remaining bonuses are distributed to the upline members involved in the promotion, according to a predetermined percentage. This cascading tier mechanism ensures that not only the direct contributors are rewarded, but also the upline members benefit from the overall performance of their team. This structure aims to encourage and reward teamwork and performance improvement, thereby driving overall business growth.

In situations where an upline member and a downline member are at the same level, the upline member will receive 10% of the downline member's bonus earnings. If multiple members are at the same level, the level matching bonus is only awarded once.

partner.directAccountsDesc: Users with account funds exceeding $100 are referred to as active users. However, you can still earn referral bonuses from trades made by accounts with less than $100 in funds.

tips.title: TIPS
tips.desc: Please contact support to request the email change.

levels.title: Lv0 - Email Verification
levels.desc: Your account has been activated, and you can now access the basic features of the platform, such as viewing account information and the trading market, as well as inviting your partners to join the platform. However, you currently cannot make any deposits or participate in trading. To ensure the security of your account, you must complete further identity verification to unlock additional features.

levels.title: Lv1 - Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
levels.desc: After completing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA), you can make deposits using certain deposit channels and start trading, with the opportunity to earn platform bonuses. At this stage, the security of your account has been further enhanced. However, to ensure the safety of your funds, you are still unable to withdraw funds. You must complete the next step of identity verification (KYC) to unlock withdrawal functionality.

levels.title: Lv2 - Identity Verification (KYC)
levels.desc: Upon completing Identity Verification (KYC), you have unlocked full access to all platform features and services. You can now make unlimited deposits and withdrawals, fully utilizing all the platform’s functionalities.

referral.bonusDesc: Earn up to {{percent}}% commission every time your friends make a trade on XXXX.
referral.spilloverDesc: When the investment amount of the accounts you refer exceeds twice your own investment amount, you can only receive half of the bonus from those accounts.
referral.activeUserDesc: Users with account funds exceeding $100 are referred to as active users. However, you can still earn referral bonuses from trades made by accounts with less than ${{amount}} in funds.
referral.requirementsDesc: The funds in your account exceeding <1>${{amount}}</1>

support.desc: Our agents are available 24 hours a day 365 days a year via email, chat and phone.

security.title: Security
security.twoFactorDesc: Keep your account secured by turning on 2FA .2FA is required when add funds and withdrawal funds.
security.twoFactorStepOne: Download a Two-Factor Authentication app to your device such as Authy or Google Authenticator.
security.twoFactorStepTwo: Use the app to scan QR code or copy and paste key
security.twoFactorStepThree: Enter your 6-digit authentication code from the app.
security.twoFactorStepAdditional: Enter your previous authentication code from the app.
security.uncertified: Upload documents and prove your identity.
security.inProgressDesc: Identity Verification is already in progress.Please wait till the check is done, it usually takes a few minutes.
security.rejectedDesc: Your previous verification request was rejected.
security.passVerificationDesc: For access to unlimited deposits and withdrawals, bank card transactions, and crypto trading.

settings.title: Settings
settings.clearCacheDesc: Are you sure you want to clear the cache? Deletingit won't affect the normal use of the app.
settings.authenticatorDesc: With 2-Step Verification, also called two-factor authentication, you can add an extra layer of security to your account in case your password is stolen.
settings.passwordChangedSuccessful: Password changed successfully, please log in again
settings.deactivationAgreement: I agree and have understood that the above account data will be permanently deleted.
settings.deactivationDesc: Deleting Forxl account will permanently delete your personal information, account assets, financial records, and transaction data.
settings.deactivationPrompt: These data cannot be recovered once deleted.
settings.deactivationTitle: Confirmed to cancel your Forxl account?
